recipe.title: Mexican Chicken Sliders
instructions: 1. In a large bowl, combine all the ingredients, except the oil, and mix to thoroughly combine. 2. Divide the mixture into 8 equal portions and form into patties. You will use about 1/4 cup of the mixture per patty. 3. Heat the oil in a skillet over medium heat and cook for 3 minutes on each side, or until chicken is cooked through. 4. Serve with your favorite burger accompaniments.
